Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Covered in a copious layer of sawdust, the entirety of the cavernous space is a hazy hue of pale blonde wood. Large windows free of glass panes can be propped open around the periphery of the space to allow air into the surroundings to combat the perpetual dust that seems to fill the air and cloud your vision as you glimpse large work tables, lumber corrals and a massive, complex water powered sawmill that dominates the majority of the floor. The rafters overhead are free from finishing touches, the roughhewn lumber matching that of the walls and floor in their ability to collect the fine dusting of wood shavings that fills every nook and cranny.

a rickety oak door leading south
A rickety oak door leads to the south. $(parent-desc)
